feed.title: Pi-hole Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.17.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add "-ni" to all sqlite3 invocations (v5) by @DL6ER in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.17.2...v5.17.3

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.18
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Drop Fedora 36 and add Fedora 39 to the test suite by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5568
  • [Vulnerability Fix] Only use local files (file://) when they have explicit permissions a+r by @DL6ER 9dd138b03348f24a001d60f27e29c8c62af28871

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.17.3...v5.18

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove double quotes that prevented any local files from being read by gravity by @PromoFaux in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5617

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.18...v5.18.1

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • More checks when downloading from file:// scheme by @orazioedoardo in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5620

New Contributors

  • @orazioedoardo made their first contribution in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5620

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.18.1...v5.18.2

entry.title: New release for Pi-hole: v5.18.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add protocol validation when downloading blocklist from URL by @DL6ER https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/commit/2c497a9a3ea099079bbcd1eb21725b0ed54b529d (https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/security/advisories/GHSA-jg6g-rrj6-xfg6 reported by @T0X1Cx)
  • Add Ubuntu 24.04 and Fedora 40, remove Fedora 38 by @yubiuser in https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/pull/5658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pi-hole/pi-hole/compare/v5.18.2...v5.18.3
